title: Secure Private Docker Registry
description: We saw how to run a simple registry container in Part 1, using the official Docker registry image. The registry server can be configured to serve HTTPS traffic on a known domain, so it's straightforward to run a secure registry for private use with a self-signed SSL certificate.

meta.title: Secure Private Docker Registry: A Comprehensive Guide
meta.description: Learn how to set up a secure private Docker registry with self-signed SSL certificates on Linux.
meta.keywords: linux lab, linux practice exercises, online kali linux terminal, ssl, practice linux commands online, linux practice online, docker command line, docker playground, linux labs, registry
